Yaks" » Index » PubSub

Class: PubSub

Defined in: src/utils/pubsub.coffee

Overview

PubSub base class

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) subscribe(key, cb) Subscribe to a message/event
  • # (void) isSubscribed(key) Check to see if there are subscriptions
  • # (void) unsubscribe(key) Unsubscribe to a message/event
  • # (void) publish(key, args = []) Publsh a message/event
  • # (Array) _getMatches(key) Get matches
  • # (void) _isMatch(subKey, _subKey) Match search key with saved key (allows for wildcard search)
  • # (void) _removeFromObject(key) Safely remove item from subscriptions object

Constructor Details

# (void) constructor(_subscriptions = {})

Construct a new PubSub instance.

Parameters:

  • subscriptions ( Object ) — container - exposed for testing

Instance Method Details

# (void) subscribe(key, cb)

Subscribe to a message/event

Examples:

Subscribe to an event 

yaks.subscribe 'message_name', -> alert('boom')

Parameters:

  • message ( String ) — key/name
  • callback ( Function ) — to be fired

# (void) isSubscribed(key)

Check to see if there are subscriptions

Parameters:

  • message ( String ) — key/name

# (void) unsubscribe(key)

Unsubscribe to a message/event

Examples:

Unsubscribe to an event 

yaks.unsubscribe 'message_name'

Parameters:

  • message ( String ) — key/name

# (void) publish(key, args = [])

Publsh a message/event

Examples:

Publish an event and data 

yaks.publish 'message_name', [ 101, 'boom' ]

Parameters:

  • message ( String ) — key/name
  • list ( Array ) — of data

# (Array) _getMatches(key)

Get matches

Parameters:

  • message ( String ) — key/name

Returns:

  • ( Array ) — Lists of keys and callbacks

# (void) _isMatch(subKey, _subKey)

Match search key with saved key (allows for wildcard search)

Parameters:

  • message ( String ) — key/name

# (void) _removeFromObject(key)

Safely remove item from subscriptions object

Parameters:

  • message ( String ) — key/name
